intro.description: You can use Folders to organise your Test Modules in a logical structure. e.g. by topic or level of difficulty.

item.title: Start the New Folder Wizard.
item.description: Right click on your user name in the Naviagator view on the left hand side and choose New Folder. This should open the New Folder Wizard.

item.title: Folder Name
item.description: Type the Folder Name and choose the parent Folder if desired.

item.title: Finish
item.description: Click Finish when you are done.
